title: Need Guidance on Offer Validation
content:

Years of Experience: 2.1

Prev Comp : 15.5 L CTC

Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 22.5
Benefits: Flight tickets, 15 days stay and other standard benefits
Had no offers to negotiate.

title: Salesforce MTS
